description: Checking to see how long a workflow suggestion has been set to in_progress

sf.aa_query: SELECT object_id as table_id,public.rdbms_tables.name, DATEDIFF('day',public.workflow_requests.ts_created, CURRENT_DATE()) AS count_days_req_open FROM public.workflow_requests INNER JOIN public.rdbms_tables ON public.workflow_requests.object_id=public.rdbms_tables.id WHERE public.workflow_requests.request_status IN ('in_progress')
sf.last_etl: SELECT last_load_time from information_schema.load_history where table_name = 'STG_RDBMS_TABLES' ORDER BY last_load_time DESC LIMIT 1
